overview: This film is part of the Twenty Puccini Project."A cellist freely interprets a few famous themes from Puccini's La Boh√®me. A camera films the musical "performance" from very close up. Shot in a single take, the point is not to tell a story, but to attempt to render the pure moment in which music emerges and an image is formed."
title: V2 (Puccini)
